atae/durkatlimmu/X660130
NA₄.KIŠIB {m}me-x x x A {m}x x-ra-šu-x x URU.x x x-a-a Bel ARAD SUM-a-ni {m}{d}x-mu-tak-kil ARAD-šu₂ u₂-piš-ma {m}{d}UTU-MU-KAM-eš ina ŠA₃ x MA.NA KU₃.BABBAR il-qe kas-pi gam-mur ta-din ARAD za-rip laq-qe tu₂-a-ru de-nu DUG₄.DUG₄ la-šu₂ man-nu ša GIL-u-ni ina de-ni-šu₂ da-bu-ub-ma la i-laq-qe  IGI {m}{d}PA-AD-DU₃ LU₂.mu-šar₂-kis IGI {m}man-nu-ki-{d}x x IGI Mušezib-Adad IGI {m}x x x x IGI {m}x x x x IGI {m}x x x-a-ni IGI {m}x x x-sa-a-ni ITU.x lim-me Mannu-ki-šarri
